TopicTitle: Someone make a music video of this.

Articles.Content: Nassault made a video in KSP that had this song in it. Someone please make a proper KSP music video using this.
I'd try to do so if only I had a good recording software and, well, computer.
Sure, I'll have a go at it

ok, so I saw the video in the OP, so i went to Nassaults channel to see if i could find out which video it was from. Then I was like 'oh that reminds me, I gotta watch that Antarctica cinematic i saw the trailer for ages ago', so I watch it and come back here to see if there's a new post. Turns out there is, and it's by the creator of the Antarctica video. Full circle.

also illuminati confirmed

ok, so I saw the video in the OP, so I went to Nassault's channel to see if i could find out which video it was from. Then I was like 'oh that reminds me, I gotta watch that Antarctica cinematic I saw the trailer for ages ago', so I watch it and come back here to see if there's a new post. Turns out there is, and it's by the creator of the Antarctica video. Full circle.

Ha ha, got to say that's an interesting story. Anyway, I take dibs on this music video! Probably going to start now, sounds a hell of a lot more fun than what I'm doing right now :/
Finished! It's not very good as it was rushed to meet with me hitting 500 subscribers, and I only did half the song due to time constraints. But I guess this works right?
